      • noeudRouteMidi

        void noeudRouteMidi(int today,
                    int nbjour,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverMidi,
                    java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> listResultatRoute,
                    int endNoeud,
                    java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> listResultat)
        If today is the lastest day, calculate whether the rider arrives at the finish node before afternoon if yes, get feasible restaurant nodes, and write paths in listNoeudRouteMidi
        Parameters:
        today - The day number of today
        nbjour - The day number of whole travel
        mapArriverMidi - The feasible lunch restaurant nodes with their arrive time
        listResultatRoute - A list of temporary results connected within all feasible node paths for whole travel
        endNoeud - The end node of whole nodes
        listResultat - A list of all feasible node paths for whole travel

        If today isn't the lastest day, calculate today's feasible paths, and write paths in listNoeudRouteJour

        today - The day number of today
